column4: I have Fluxbox installed, and when I right click on my Desktop to luanch an app it just has a small box that says Fluxbox on it. How do I fix my install so that I can use it?
i had that same proble when i tried fluxbox.
You think the package might be corrupted or something?
i've gotten it to work properly, but i did it by downloading Fluxbuntu..lol
